MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers calling from the TD15 postcode area of Berwick Upon Tweed, affecting properties in Fenham Mill and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:45pm due to a immediate safety concern with our equipment and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 2:15pm. We will make every effort to contact you if the situation changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:52pm on Wednesday, 28 October 2020
